title: Fix password gate password and hint text

requirements.summary: Change the password gate to accept exactly "9102008" and unlock the Valentine content when entered.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx, the password check uses the exact string "9102008" as the correct password.
When the user enters "9102008" in the password screen and submits, the app unlocks and shows the main Valentine page content.
When the user enters any other password, the app remains locked and shows the existing error message.

file_operations.description: Update the CORRECT_PASSWORD constant so the password comparison matches exactly "9102008", keeping the existing sessionStorage persistence mechanism (key "valentine_unlocked") unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update the password screen hint line text to the requested exact wording.
acceptanceCriteria: On the password gate screen (frontend/src/components/PasswordGateView.tsx), the hint line displays exactly: "Hint: The most happiest day for me."
No other user-facing text is changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing hint text line with exactly: "Hint: The most happiest day for me.", ensuring no other user-facing strings are modified.
